keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest in green energy for a million homes. Create a full network of electric vehicle chargers to encourage people to switch. New £5,000 grants to help people retrain into future-proof new jobs.
More in-class support for every child. Permanent jobs to thousands of teachers currently on casual contracts.
More mental health specialists in communities. Double the number of counsellors we train, with new grants to help them get qualified.
Tackling climate change with a green recovery. Scotland has missed its climate change targets.
1500 young people are waiting more than a year for mental health treatment.

issues.environment: Tackling climate change with a green recovery.
issues.health: Support to help our health services recover. Extra support for mental health treatment.

images.caption: Willie Rennie holding a sign with members of the Scottish Liberal Democrats around him

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet focuses on moving forward from division and prioritizing recovery. It also emphasizes the need for real action to improve education and health services, and highlights the internal division within the SNP and the conservative's inability to unite the country.
